author: foxnews.com
title: Pope Francis: Priests will be able to absolve the "sin of abortion" | On Air
text: Pope Francis: Priests will be able to absolve the "sin of abortion" Sep. 01, 2015 - 1:13 - Pope Francis says priests will be able to absolve what he calls the sin of abortion if women seek forgiveness with a contrite heart. The Pope says the ruling affects the Holy Year of Mercy which runs from this December until late November 2016.ï»¿
